docs.lead_paragraph: RUMANIA has postally commemorated the crossing of the Dniester River by Rumanian forces invading the U.S.S.R. "Transnistria" (Across the Dniester) is inscribed along the base of 6-lei light brown, 12L violet and 24L deep blue stamps which present the figure of Duca Voda, a military commander in the Ukraine in 1654-86.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Dec. 7 -- In his annual report, which by a coincidence was prepared for release to the press tomorrow, Admiral Stark, Chief of Naval Operations, stressed that the time factor had achieved "the greatest urgency" in United States naval...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 7 -- In his annual report, which by a coincidence was prepared for release to the press tomorrow, Admiral Stark, Chief of Naval Operations, stressed that the time factor had achieved "the greatest urgency" in United States naval preparations for eventualities.

headline.main: SAYS TIME FACTOR IS VITAL TO NAVY; Stark's Annual Report Calls It a Problem of 'Greatest Urgency' in Preparedness

J. Sloane.

headline.main: ALL AMERICAS JOIN IN CERAMICS SHOW; 600 Items From 18 Countries Exhibited Here -- 200 U.S. Artists Represented

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Dec. 8 -- After a day of consultations with the diplomatic representatives of most South American republics and two conferences between Foreign Minister Ruiz Guinazu and United States Ambassador Norman Armour, the Argentine...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Dec. 8 -- After a day of consultations with the diplomatic representatives of most South American republics and two conferences between Foreign Minister Ruiz Guinazu and United States Ambassador Norman Armour, the Argentine Foreign Ministery announced tonight that a Cabinet Council would be held tomorrow to issue a decree declaring the United States would not be considered a belligerent power in its conflict with Japan.

byline.original: By ARNALDO CORTESISpecial Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES
